objects.text:
925 Sterling Silver Premium Quality
Elegant Pink Drop Design
Perfect Gift for Special Occasions
6 Month Warranty Included

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner is a clean and elegant e-commerce product ad designed to promote luxurious jewelry. It features a balanced composition with a soft pink background and ornamental line accents framing the layout. At the center is a high-quality image of rose gold earrings placed in front of a subtle circular gradient to draw attention to the product. The headline text (`heading`) at the top is bold and uppercase, conveying a premium tone, while the subheading (`subheading`) in a stylized sans-serif highlights the product name. Descriptive text (`description`) beneath provides concise features. Price (`price`) is highlighted in large bold text, and a pink-button call-to-action (`cta`) with white text offers a clear prompt to shop. Visual harmony is maintained with consistent padding and pastel hues.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Rose Pink: `#FFF5F7`
- Dusty Rose: `#D6818C`
- Blush Pink: `#E8A1A8`
- Light Mauve: `#F8D0D7`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Deep Rosewood (text): `#995159`
product_color: The product image features a delicate and elegant color palette centered around Rose Gold (#EFA6A1), which forms the base structure of the earrings. This warm pinkish metal hue adds a luxurious and soft aesthetic. Accentuating the design are clear, diamond-like gemstones with a crisp White (#FFFFFF) and subtle glints of Ice Blue (#DFF4FF), enhancing the brilliance and clarity. The blush Pink (#F7C6CE) teardrop center lends a feminine and soft romantic touch. These colors are well-blended, with the rose gold highlighting the soft pink and making the white stones pop, creating harmony and contrast ideal for an advertising banner.
